name: Empires Legacy
description:
Empires Legacy is a Real-Time Strategy project heavily inspired by the popular Age of Empires, bringing its legacy to the mobile devices to be enjoyed by diehard fans and casual players alike. Classic yet intuitive gameplay utilized for touch interface and faster paced gameplay revitalize the aging design to be played in bit sized and fit the pocket devices. Applying a colorful yet visually simple graphical approach to ease the player. But don’t be fooled with all its simplicity, the gameplay will offer something different for each civilizations, making the experience unique and tailored per civilizations instead of just a simple different stats.

Features :

1. Six Playable Civilization (Saracens, China, Mongols, Britons, REDACTED, and REDACTED), with one unlocked without any cost at the free version.

2. Squad based unit movement instead of individual unit controls.

3. Multitouch intuitive control system.

4. AI Skirmish and Short Historical Campaigns for each civilizations.

5. Versatile map editor with in-game user content sharing system.

6. LAN based multiplayer system.

Who Are We ?
We are Trimatra Interactive, an indie game studio established in 2019.  Our debut game Ravensword: Undaunted will launch soon in Early Access on Steam. We are looking for people to develop a smaller project as a labor of love to the RTS genre.

What we are looking for ?
We are currently looking for dedicated members who are passionate in working to make an RTS game. Specifically, we are looking for Assistant Gameplay Programmer (Unity 3D) and 3D Character Modeler with the ability to create units in similar artstyle with Unity mecanim rig. We  are also looking for publishers/investors that are interested in funding the project to take it further.

How Far is the Project ?
 Currently some basic system has been done, such as the general camera movement, building system, unit recruiting and training system, unit squad based navigation movement and much more. But, there is still much left to be done to deliver an enjoyable experience on mobile.

When will it get released ?
We’re planning to get it released as Early Access as soon as possible.
